results.title: A single CT-guided percutaneous intraosseous injection of thermosensitive simvastatin/poloxamer 407 hydrogel enhances vertebral bone formation in ovariectomized minipigs.
results.text_hl: Directly delivering @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to the specific bone that is prone to @DISEASE_Fractures_Bone @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fractures@@@ may reinforce the target bone and reduce the incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Fragile_X_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005600 @@@fragility fractures@@@.

citations.NLM: Tan J, Fu X, Sun CG, Liu C, Zhang XH, Cui YY, Guo Q, Ma T, Wang H, Du GH, Yin X, Liu ZJ, Leng HJ, Xu YS, Song CL. A single CT-guided percutaneous intraosseous injection of thermosensitive simvastatin/poloxamer 407 hydrogel enhances vertebral bone formation in ovariectomized minipigs. Osteoporos Int. 2016 Feb;27(2):757-67. PMID: 26223190
